overview: Get Ready To Go Deep Undercover Trudy is a housewife with a secret. She's a spy for the U.S. Government. Her husband is a bored businessman with a secret of his own. He's a master philanderer. Sparks - and sheets - fly when their two shadowy worlds collide in a sex - drenched cloak and dagger adventure.
tagline: Half the Truth is Still a Whole Lie
title: Tru Lies
